page.title: 16EVENTS
page.content: Perry Hall Park was once the site of Perry Hall,which was demolished earlier this century;it now provides open space for football and cricket and for children to play. Perry Barr Park is the largest open space in the area.Nearly every year a circus comes to the park to entertain the people around the area.The Birmingham Show is another event that comes to the park each year.There are numerous events including flowers, pets and dog shows.There are lots of other entertainments such as pony rides and a childrens play area. Alexander Stadium is sited in this park; it is managed by Mr Gary Cooke the athlete and hosts many international events.The Stadium provides seating and terraces;more stands are under construction.
